#
# Source files: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE: edit CMakeListsLocal.txt instead.
#
#

SET (LOCAL_LIBRARY_BASENAME vtkMRProstateCare)

INCLUDE (${VTKMRPROSTATECARE_SOURCE_DIR}/cxx/CMakeListsLocal.txt)

# --------------------------------------------------------------------------
# You probably do not need to modify anything below this line

#
# Create the vtkMRProstateCare C++ library
#
# (Doesn't work here because of a CMake bug)
# ADD_LIBRARY (vtkMRProstateCare LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS)

#
# Create the vtkMRProstateCare Tcl library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKMRPROSTATECARE_WRAP_TCL)

  VTK_WRAP_TCL (vtkMRProstateCareTCL MRProstateCareTCL_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkMRProstateCareTCL ${MRProstateCareTCL_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareTCL 
                         vtkMRProstateCare
                         vtkIOTCL 
                         vtkGraphicsTCL 
                         vtkImagingTCL 
                         vtkFilteringTCL 
                         vtkCommonTCL
                         ${TCL_LIBRARY})
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareTCL vtkHybridTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareTCL vtkParallelTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareTCL vtkPatentedTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareTCL vtkRenderingTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKMRPROSTATECARE_WRAP_TCL)

#
# Create the vtkMRProstateCare Python library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKMRPROSTATECARE_WRAP_PYTHON)

  VTK_WRAP_PYTHON (vtkMRProstateCarePython MRProstateCarePython_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

  IF (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkMRProstateCarePython MODULE ${MRProstateCarePython_SRCS})
  ELSE (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkMRProstateCarePython SHARED ${MRProstateCarePython_SRCS})
  ENDIF (APPLE)

  IF (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCarePython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           debug ${PYTHON_DEBUG_LIBRARY} 
                           optimized ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ELSE (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCarePython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ENDIF (WIN32)

  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCarePython vtkHybridPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCarePython vtkParallelPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCarePython vtkPatentedPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCarePython vtkRenderingPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKMRPROSTATECARE_WRAP_PYTHON)

#
# Create the vtkMRProstateCare Java library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKMRPROSTATECARE_WRAP_JAVA)

  VTK_WRAP_JAVA (vtkMRProstateCareJava MRProstateCareJava_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkMRProstateCareJava SHARED ${MRProstateCareJava_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareJava 
                         vtkIOJava
                         vtkGraphicsJava
                         vtkImagingJava 
                         vtkFilteringJava
                         vtkCommonJava)
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareJava vtkHybridJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareJava vtkParallelJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareJava vtkPatentedJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkMRProstateCareJava vtkRenderingJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKMRPROSTATECARE_WRAP_JAVA)

#
# Link to VTK and local
#

LINK_LIBRARIES (
  vtkMRProstateCare
  vtkIO
  vtkGraphics
  vtkImaging 
  vtkFiltering
  vtkCommon
)

IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkHybrid)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkParallel)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkPatented)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
  LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRendering)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
